Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO FIELD (mUpdated,mName,mType,mProperties) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mProperties=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from FIELD where mName=? and mType=?
select g.*,l.mDisplay as mGrpDspl from FIELD_GROUP g left join LOOKUP l on g.mGroup=l.mName
delete from FIELD_GROUP where mGroup=? and mFieldId=?
INSERT INTO FIELD_GROUP (mUpdated,mGroup,mFieldId,mDisplay,mSort) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mDisplay=?,mSort=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select f.*,g.mDisplay from FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=g.mFieldId and g.mGroup=?
